body:
try modifying [tensorflow.bzl here ](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl#L261) by adding an extra parameter:

```
use_default_shell_env=True,
```

and building with: 

```
--genrule_strategy=standalone --spawn_strategy=standalone
```

thanks to [bazel support](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!msg/bazel-discuss/FrHiyndAtik/HAbZBGGXFQAJ)
